**A Thousand Splendid Suns**  
**Published by Riverhead Books**  

Welcome to the world of **Penguin Group**! Whether you're in New York, Toronto, London, or even halfway across the globe in New Delhi or Auckland, we’ve got your reading needs covered. Since 2007, we’ve been sharing stories that resonate with the heart and soul. 

This book is a work of fiction, and while the characters and places might feel real, they’re all products of the author’s imagination. Any similarities to actual people or events are purely coincidental. 

Just a heads up: all rights to this book are reserved. That means you can’t copy, scan, or share it without permission. So, let’s keep it legit—purchase only authorized editions and support the authors behind the stories you love.

If you're curious about the author, Khaled Hosseini, you might also want to check out his other popular work, **The Kite Runner**. 

And a little note for the tech-savvy: while we’ve done our best to provide accurate contact info for various services mentioned, things might change after publication. So, if you find a number or link that doesn’t work, it’s not on us!

Happy reading!

**PAGE SUMMARY:** This page provides publication details and copyright information for Khaled Hosseini's novel "A Thousand Splendid Suns."
